thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com | 3 of 59
thread.title: Chris G
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Chris G

author: Chris G
title: Chris G
text: The mark of a good company is not how they perform when all is well, but how they perform when an issue arises. Brake Performance resolved my issue with flying colors! I initially received the wrong front rotors, but Vicky in their customer service solved my issue and sent me the correct rotors very quickly. She was very professional and very responsive making me feel well cared for. Thank you Vicky and Brake Performance! I'll be back the next time I need brakes and will also tell my friends about you folks.
